ngiemboon: Múɔ manzwě aa lepfó láʼ gíléye à tè zsé ngie legwe aa wó wɔ́.
en: When a girl is alone in the neighborhood, she doesn't know that there is death.

ngiemboon: Anzwě we zyě tàʼ múɔ mbàŋa.
en: His wife gave birth to a baby boy.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n gyǎ tsɔ̌ múɔ méntsẅǐ múɔ, á gẅiin nzàba.
en: I saw a tiny child, he had a hedgehog.

ngiemboon: Kɔ múɔ pɔ̀ɔn wɔ̀ɔn ńgʉa ńnuŋe tsɛ̀ɛ múɔ ndá mèŋ.
en: Take my wallet and go put it in my room.
